dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3820 IH: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs women’s health clinic in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, as the Anna Mae Robertson VA Well Woman Clinic.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Moore of Wisconsin (for herself, Mr. Steil, Mr. Pocan, Mr. Fitzgerald, and Mr. Wied) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs women’s health clinic in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, as the Anna Mae Robertson VA Well Woman Clinic.

section.header: Name of Department of Veterans Affairs women’s health clinic, Milwaukee, Wisconsin
section.text: The women’s health clinic (Red Team clinic) of the Clement J. Zablocki Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, shall, after the date of the enactment of this Act, be known and designated as the Anna Mae Robertson VA Well Woman Clinic. Any reference to such women’s health clinic in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be considered to be a reference to the Anna Mae Robertson VA Well Woman Clinic.
